original_title: Hutchison announces management change in Hutch Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: HUTCH Sri Lanka CEO Thirukumar Nadarasa retires after 25 years with the Hutchison Group. During his tenure, he held key positions in several Hutchison Telecommunication subsidiaries last as CEO of HUTCH Sri Lanka. Under his leadership, the organization has achieved significant results in an extremely competitive market.

Saumitra Gupta, is appointed as new Chief Executive Officer (Actg.) effective from 1st August 2023. Saumitra re-joined Hutch Sri Lanka in 2021 as Chief Commercial Officer after his secondment to Hutchison Indonesia. He was instrumental in reorganizing the commercial division and generating positive customer and revenue growth for the organization. He has over 20 years of experience in the Telecommunications & IT industry spanning over Africa, Middle East, South Asia, and Southeast Asia. He holds a bachelor’s degree in Electronics & Communications Engineering, and postgraduate in Telecom Management with specialization in Marketing & Finance.

Commenting on the appointment, Saumitra stated, “I am honored and excited to lead Hutch into this transformative era. Our continuing focus will be to deliver best mobile data experience to all Sri Lankans. We will continue to develop our service offerings on our nationwide 4G infrastructure to help build a digitally inclusive nation whilst providing great value to our customers and all stakeholders”.
